teacher_turns.text: ? (Not exactly sure of the mother of all the children story, but I think you know what I mean)  ## Step 1: Understand the prompt The prompt asks if there are any holidays celebrated with family, special traditions, funny stories,

released a children's album on The new Ebenezer ## Step 2: Identify the holidays and traditions I do celebrate several holidays with my family, including Christmas, Thanksgiving, and Easter. We have various traditions such as decorating the house,

with all of the people we love for a long time. In addition, I do enjoy family vacations. One of our family vacation spots is a lake house. We have so many great memories from these trips, and it's wonderful to spend time with

and they never knew the world was like this. Our Christmas Eve tradition is having a Christmas Eve box for each of the kids to open as soon as they come home from school on Christmas Eve and then we go to church. We have a special Christmas
